stimulusHtml: In The Oxbow (View from Mount Holyoke, Northampton, Massachusetts, after a Thunderstorm), Thomas Cole contrasts a stormy mountain wilderness on the left with sunny cultivated farmland on the right, capturing his possible views regarding the
choicesHtml: eruption of the Civil War and the issue of state rights
